original: Lejdström, Lars, distriktslantmätare, Vetlanda, f. 11/2/10 i Slättåkra, Hall. 1., av speditör C. A. Lejdström o. Anna Andersson. G. 38 m. Birgit Hägg. Barn: Per f. 39, Lena 40, Bo 46. — Stud:ex. i Halmstad 29, lant-mät:ex. 32, kulturtekn. ex. v. KTH 34. Konstit. t. e. lantmät. 32, tjg. som e. lantmät. inom Kalmar län 32-33, inom Södermanl. län 34-39, byråtj. v. lantmät :styr. 39-42, uppeh. befattn. som distr rlantmät. i Kalmar södra distr. 42-47, distr ilantmät. i Vetlanda distr. fr. 48.
translated:
Lejdström, Lars, district land surveyor, Vetlanda, b. 11/2/10 in Slättåkra, Halland, 1st child of shipping agent C. A. Lejdström and Anna Andersson. Married in 1938 to Birgit Hägg. Children: Per b. 1939, Lena b. 1940, Bo b. 1946. 

Education: Graduated from high school in Halmstad in 1929, land surveyor examination in 1932, cultural engineering examination at KTH (Royal Institute of Technology) in 1934. 

Professional experience: Appointed as temporary assistant land surveyor in 1932, served as permanent land surveyor in the Kalmar county from 1932 to 1933, served in the Södermanland county from 1934 to 1939. Worked at the land surveying board from 1939 to 1942, held position as district chief land surveyor in the southern district of Kalmar from 1942 to 1947, and as district land surveyor in the Vetlanda district from 1948 onwards.
